DOC.brief_summary: This multi-center retrospective observational research study collect data participant initiate docetaxel treatment relapse non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) 6 year start data collection completed/stopped docetaxel treatment least 30 day prior data collection . The primary goal study describe percentage participant least one neutropenic sepsis ( NS ) episode follow initiation treatment single-agent docetaxel . Data collect end docetaxel treatment plus additional 30 day allow presentation toxicity .
DOC.brief_title: Neutropenic Sepsis Patients With Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer Treated With Single-Agent Docetaxel Associated Resource Use UK
